job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pstrongWho Are WestrongppHey there were PricePoint We make buying and selling moving services simple When companies have employees transfer from one office to another or move to a new country for work the company needs to move that persons stuffand the process for pricing those moves has been long outdatednbsp Thats why PricePoint was bornnbspppbrppAt our core were a team of problem solvers who identified a big issue in a big industry and weve set out to fix itnbsp Our mission is to bring transparency and simplicity to the pricing process for moving peoples household goods around the world nbspnbspnbspppbrppWe started by building a solution that helped movers automate their pricing and connect to their global partnersnbsp After 7 years of onboarding more than 700 movers in over 140 countries onto our system we expanded to help Relocation Management Companies and Corporations buy those moving services better Imagine buying something and not knowing how much it costs until weeks later  thats sort of how it works in our industry PricePoint empowers movers and corporations to make better decisions speed up the process save money and make the lives of the people moving betternbspnbspnbspppbrppstrongPricePoint Is HiringstrongppYou knew that Thats why youre here But yes were looking for an incredible engineer and worldclass person to join our growing team We have a ton of new things to build and over the next year were going to be taking on some serious work well be updating both of our product lines as well as upgrading our infrastructure to let it handle 10 times the load Its an exciting time to join and you will be at the center of it allppbrppSome of our challenges will involve solving scalability problems and improving our automated testing Whether that means building out a Kubernetes cluster integrating a load balancer into our deployment process or improving operational monitoring we are looking for someone exceptional who is going to roll up their sleeves and make it happenppbrppstrongAbout You As a PersonstrongpulliYou love technology and you love to build thingsliliYou want to have a big impact on a growing companyliliYou like working in small teams and wearing lots of hatsliliYoure able to work remotely perhaps you fancy yourself a digital nomadliliYoure a selfstarterwe had to say it its in every job description But also its really true about you Youre going to work remotely and wear a lot of hats Selfmotivation and the ability to work independently are vital to your successliulpbrppstrongAbout You As an EngineerstrongpulliYou are a great engineer able to pick up new technologies quicklyliliYou arent scared of any challenge you jump in and learn the skills you need to get the job doneliliYou dont like being pigeonholed you want to work on the full stack from hardware to cssliliExperience with web application development is a plusliliJavascript frameworks angular react redux backbone ember etcliliRelational databases mysql postgres mssql oracleliliTesting methodologies test driven development behavior driven development unit testing functional testingliliContinuous integrationdelivery build test deploy automation platform as a serviceliulpbrppstrongWhy Join PricePointstrongppWe are a growing team with big ambitions that believes in being the best at what you do and enjoying life while you do it Whether it is designing a truly delightful user experience getting to 100 test coverage or picking the best mountain for our winter retreat we like doing things right the first timeppbrppAnd you will wear all of the hats Joining a small team will give you the opportunity to learn to do everything from provisioning a new VM to writing the css that lines up that pesky button Some of the technologies you will work with everyday include Amazon Web Services EC2 ELB RDS etc Kubernetes NodeJS React Redux Material UI We believe that a good engineer is someone that can learn any technology and technologically we are always looking forward Youll be the person at the heart of all of that as we grow and evolveppbrppstrongWhere Are We All Over The WorldnbspstrongppHere at PricePoint our team is completely remote With team members in four different countries and our customers spread all around the world we offer the incredible opportunity to work from wherever you like That opportunity though requires a special type of person Global collaboration is at the core of what we do so weve built our team with good communicators who can also handle things on their own If youre someone like that youll fit in well hereppbrppstrongThe Fine PrintstrongppThis is a fulltime salaried position We provide funding for healthcare and unlimited vacation days to our full time employees at PricePoint if you need time off just mark it in your google calendar Dont schedule time off when weve got a big event coming upbut then again thats not the type of person you arenbspnbspppbrppWe are still in startup mode so youll probably receive a bottle of Don Julio 1942 Tequila upon joining the company its become a traditionand dont say you dont like tequila until youve tried it but unfortunately a 401k isnt happening all that soon In due timeppbrppAt PricePoint were proud to be an equal opportunity employer and take seriously the opportunity to employ people of all races genders orientations and backgrounds in accordance with all applicable lawsnbspnbspppbrppstrongReady to Take the Next StepsstrongppWere looking to grow quickly so if you think you are a great fit to be a great member of our team please contact Neal Siebert at nealpricepointmovescom send your resume and a brief cover letter and lets set up a time to talknbspp
